A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Grew up with the originals. Found the prequels to be a bit off but totally respected most of the story lines. Liked TFA - was very emotion despite some flaws in it. Enjoyed Rogue as a pure stand alone that lightly tied into the universe. Though this movie was totally off base - thought maybe I had a bad night. So much promise such a wasted effort... most of it is covered in the .5-2 star ratings. Left TFA rejuvenated - left this sad.
